title: 하이토스 테마
content:
[[module css]]
@import url('https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/korean-font/KCC-eunyoung.css');
@import url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/theme%3Ahytoth/1');

#header h1 a,
#header h2 span {
    font-family: 'KCC-eunyoung', 'Charm', cursive;
}
 
#header h1 a::before {
    content: "제2하이토스교";
}

#header h2 span::before {
    content: "생명, 존재, 영원";
}
[[/module]]

[[iftags +테마]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

이것은 [[[second-hytoth-hub|제2하이토스교]]] 테마임!

사용하기 위해서는 다음 구문을 문서 최상단에 삽입하시오.

> [[include :scpko:theme:hytoth]]

이 테마와 함께 사용할 수 있는 전용 div 상자가 13종 있음:

[[collapsible show="＋ div 상자들 열기." hide="－ div 상자들 닫기."]]
[[div class="opening"]]
@@[[div class="opening"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="saduj"]]
@@[[div class="saduj"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="nicole"]]
@@[[div class="nicole"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="sarah"]]
@@[[div class="sarah"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="bleu"]]
@@[[div class="bleu"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="fondation"]]
@@[[div class="fondation"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="inconnu"]]
@@[[div class="inconnu"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="merle"]]
@@[[div class="merle"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="affiche"]]
@@[[div class="affiche"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="quatrieme"]]
@@[[div class="quatrieme"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="samarah"]]
@@[[div class="samarah"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="st-hubert"]]
@@[[div class="st-hubert"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[div class="comptine"]]
@@[[div class="comptine"]]@@
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

제2하이토스 GoI 양식도 여기 첨부함. 예시와 그 코드는 다음과 같음.

[[collapsible show="＋ 양식 열기." hide="－ 양식 닫기."]]

[[div class="orderwrapper"]]
[[div class="second-hytoth"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="ordertitle"]]
+* Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet
[[/div]]
[[div class="orderdescription"]]
 _
 _
Consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Potenti nullam ac tortor vitae purus faucibus ornare suspendisse.
[[/div]]
[[div class="itemno"]]
++* Est sit amet facilisis magna. Ut venenatis tellus in metus.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="fondation"]]
@@[[div class="orderwrapper"]]@@
@@[[div class="second-hytoth"]]@@
@@[[/div]]@@
@@[[div class="ordertitle"]]@@
@@+* Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet@@
@@[[/div]]@@
@@[[div class="orderdescription"]]@@
@@ _@@
@@ _@@
Consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Potenti nullam ac tortor vitae purus faucibus ornare suspendisse.
@@[[/div]]@@
@@[[div class="itemno"]]@@
@@++* Est sit amet facilisis magna. Ut venenatis tellus in metus.@@
@@[[/div]]@@
@@[[/div]]@@
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

------
= [[span style="font-family: 'KCC-eunyoung'; font-size: 2em;"]]헤더 글꼴은 [https://gongu.copyright.or.kr/gongu/wrt/wrt/view.do?wrtSn=13072022&menuNo=200023 KCC은영체]입니다.[[/span]]

= ,,the eldritch is gay,,

[[/iftags]]
author: Salamander724
